title: Anthony Grayling on Bombing Civilians in Wartime
description: Anthony Grayling argues that bombing civilians in Dresden and other German cities in the Second World War was morally wrong.
content:encoded: Anthony Grayling argues that bombing civilians in Dresden and other German cities in the Second World War was morally wrong.
